BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 000356 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 6 to allow a volume that has been eliminated, discontinued and closed to be part of an adjoining zoning lot and to allow development within such volume.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 000355 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 6 to allow to allow location of a proposed building without regard for the applicable yard and height and setback regulations.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 000353 PCM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the site selection and acquisition of real property located at West 56th Street, Borough of Manhattan , Council District no. 6, for use as a multi-story sanitation garage complex .  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.

Uniform land use review procedure, application no. C 010098 MMM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, changes to the City Map, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 6.  This application is subject to Council review and action only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by a vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter and §11.20 of the Rules of the Council.
